description: Refreshing and sweet lemonade just like mom made it
steps: Peel 6 lemons and combine the peels with 1 cup of sugar in a bowl. Stir and let it infuse overnight.
Bring 5 cups of water to a gentle boil and pour it into the bowl with the lemon peels and sugar. Stir until the sugar dissolves.
Strain out the lemon peels from the mixture.
Squeeze the juice from all 6 lemons into the sweetened lemon water.
Chill the lemonade in the refrigerator for a few hours.
Serve the lemonade over ice and enjoy the refreshing taste of the ultimate country fair lemonade.
